name: node-serverless-template
description: NextJS frontend template for aws serverless service

scripts.install-linux: npm run remove-node_modules-linux && npm run prod-install-linux && npm i
scripts.remove-node_modules-linux: f() { if [ -d node_modules ]; then rm -r node_modules; else echo false; fi; }; f
scripts.install-windows: npm run remove-node_modules-windows && npm run prod-install-windows && npm i
scripts.build: npm run build-infra && npm run build-server
scripts.offline: npm run build-server && set APP_ENV=Offline && node ./dist/entry.js
scripts.bootstrap-dev: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk bootstrap --profile howserDev
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk deploy --profile howserDev
scripts.diff-dev: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk diff --profile howserDev
scripts.bootstrap-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk bootstrap --profile prod
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk deploy --profile prod
scripts.diff-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk diff --profile prod

author: Lee Jeong-Woo, Lim Jae-young
